title-group.article-title: The Current and Future Basis for Aircraft Air Pollution Control

permissions.copyright-statement: Â© Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc., 1972

abstract.p: The present regulatory tool for assessment of aircraft smoke emission, the Ringelmann Chart, is described; some of the shortcomings associated with its use for aircraft are discussed; research and development efforts to improve on this system are described. The gaseous pollutants, their relative importance in an airport area and research underway or needed is also discussed.

ref.mixed-citation: R. E. George and R. M. Burlin, "Air Pollution from Com- mercial Jet Aircraft in Los Angeles County." April 1960.
